text: The wheels on the Monster Truck go round and round

Round and round
Round and round
The wheels on the Monster Truck go round and round
All through the town
The cars on the monster truck go Smash Smash Smash...

Smash Smash Smash
Smash Smash Smash
The cars on the monster truck go Smash Smash Smash...
All through the town
The wipers on the Monster truck go Swish Swish Swish

Swish Swish Swish 
Swish Swish Swish
The wipers on the Monster truck go Swish Swish Swish
All through the town
The horn on the Monster truck goes Beep Beep Beep...
Beep Beep Beep...
Beep Beep Beep...
The horn on the Monster truck goes Beep Beep Beep...
All through the town
The windows on the Monster truck go Up and down...

Up and down 
Up and down...
The windows on the Monster truck go Up and down...
All through the town
